page.title: 17GLYNDE RECREATION GROUND
page.content: Beside the Cricket Club is Glynde Recreation Ground. It has five swings, a roundabout, a may pole, a slide, a seesaw and some poles to climb on. It is by the swimming pool. All of this equipment is about ten years old. The slide is about eight metres high. The swings are very squeaky. The climbing bars are hard to get up on but we managed. The sand pit hasn't much sand in it but has enough for long jumps. Some children jumped to the other side but no one jumped right over it. The park is never full of children because so few children live in Glynde.
